Py_FORCE_UTF8_LOCALE = false
CPython/Include/pyport.h: Use UTF-8 as the filesystem encoding. See PyUnicode_DecodeFSDefaultAndSize(), PyUnicode_EncodeFSDefault(), Py_DecodeLocale() and Py_EncodeLocale(). Source   Edit
